## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand with a safety buffer, considering demand variability and current stock level. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 2,000 units less than the player's planned order. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2.8 days                                |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 6 days                                   |
| Comments                          | Ordering 20,000 units ensures sufficient stock to cover the forecasted demand for the next 5 days, even with potential fluctuations. This strategy reduces the risk of stockouts while maintaining a healthy inventory turnover. |
